nodes.text: A male Human served as the captain of the New Republic Dauntless-class heavy cruiser Endor. In 13 ABY, he took the Endor on a patrol near the planetoid RZ7-6113-23 and intercepted two TIE/sr starfighters. They tried to follow the starfighters only to be led into a trap. The captain realized the trap too late and the Endor was destroyed by a single blast from the fully charged cannon.
